org.svvrl.goal.gui

Class ControllableTab

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.svvrl.goal.gui.Tab
              • org.svvrl.goal.gui.ControllableTab
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, AlgorithmListener, ControllableListener, EditableListener

    public class ControllableTab
extends Tab
implements ControllableListener, AlgorithmListener
    A ControllableTab is a tab for a EditableAlgorithm object. This tab contains three parts: a tool bar with tools controlling the algorithm, an editor containing the editable object manipulated by the algorithm, and a panel showing the output messages of the algorithm.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
